About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hey I am Merine. Just a girl in love with code. I work with businesses to bring their ideas to life by creating high performance & rich interactive responsive websites that work across all platforms & devices. I primarily use HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript. In a quest to give back to the community, I occassionally offer my skills, cost free, to black female owned businesses.

Lavemont Cleaning Company

This project was purely on HTML, CSS and JS.

English jobs in Company

A wordpress website made with plugins for job board purposes. This is also a project close to my heart as the business targets immigrants professionals.

Vist the Website

Ecommerce Store

This was a project done for a hair selling company in Germany (black female owned business). Project close to my heart
